ApiKey.Name: Google Gemini API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Your API key from Google AI Studio (https://ai.google.dev/). Required to use the AI Dungeon Master features.

Model.Name: Gemini Model
Model.Hint: Which Gemini model to use. Flash is faster and cheaper, Pro is more capable.

Temperature.Name: AI Creativity (Temperature)
Temperature.Hint: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values (0.3) are more focused and deterministic, higher values (1.5) are more creative and varied.

MaxTokens.Name: Maximum Response Length
MaxTokens.Hint: Maximum number of tokens (roughly words) in AI responses. Higher values allow longer responses but cost more.

ChatNotifications.Name: Show Chat Notifications
ChatNotifications.Hint: Display AI responses as chat messages in the main chat window.

PlayerCommands.Name: Allow Player Chat Commands
PlayerCommands.Hint: Allow non-GM players to use /aidm and /dm chat commands. GM always has access.
